fields.question: What are the SOLID principles?
fields.answer: S - Single-responsiblity principle. O - Open-closed principle. L - Liskov substitution principle. I - Interface segregation principle. D - Dependency Inversion Principle.

fields.question: What are the elements of APIE?
fields.answer: Abstraction, Polymorphism, Inheritance and Encapsulation. These are known as the four pillars of OOP.
